remarks: The operator which multiplies an m x n matrix with an n x p matrix, see also the definition in [Lang] p. 504.  Note that it is not generally possible to recover the dimensions from the matrix, since all n x 0 and all 0 x n matrices are represented by the empty set.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 4-Sep-2015.)
